category.name: rng.h
category.brief: rng.h defines random number generator functions.

function.name: rng_MT19937_genrand
function.doc: rng_MT19937_genrand random number generator using the standard Mersenne Twister algorithm.

function.name: rng_MT19937_sgenrand
function.doc: rng_MT19937_sgenrand defines a seed for the random number generator function "rng_MT19937_genrand".
